items.question: How quickly can you come out for emergency service?
items.answer: We offer emergency service around the clock. In Stockholm and surrounding areas, we can usually be on site within 2-4 hours for urgent problems.

items.answer: Yes, all our installers are certified according to Safe Water standards and have several years of experience with plumbing installations.

items.question: What's included in your guarantee?
items.answer: All our work comes with full guarantee on materials and workmanship. The guarantee period varies depending on the type of work, but is at least 2 years.

items.answer: Yes, we help both private individuals with home renovations and businesses with larger plumbing projects. We have experience with everything from apartments to office buildings.

faq.question: How long do residents need to be away during pipe replacement?
faq.answer: It depends on the scope, but we plan the work so that disruption is minimized. Often residents can stay with short interruptions in water supply.

faq.question: What does pipe replacement cost?
faq.answer: The cost varies greatly depending on the building's size and the pipe system's complexity. We provide free quotes after inspection.

faq.question: How do I know if my property needs pipe replacement?
faq.answer: Signs that pipe replacement is needed include low water pressure, rusty water, leaks, or pipes older than 30-40 years.

relining.title: Relining in Stockholm – renovate pipes without demolition
relining.description: Modern relining technology for existing pipes

hero.h1: Relining in Stockholm – renovate pipes without demolition
hero.intro: Relining is a modern method for renewing pipe systems without having to dig up. Perfect for historic buildings or when disruption should be minimized.
features: No demolition or disruption of surroundings
Faster execution than traditional pipe replacement
Environmentally friendly method with minimal waste

faq.question: Which pipes can be relined?
faq.answer: Most drainage and water pipes can be relined, but it depends on the pipe's condition and diameter. We make a thorough assessment before work begins.

faq.question: How long does relining last?
faq.answer: A well-executed relining can last 30-50 years, which is as long as traditional pipes. The material is durable and corrosion-resistant.

faq.question: Is relining more expensive than pipe replacement?
faq.answer: Initially, relining may be somewhat more expensive, but when including costs for demolition and restoration, it often becomes cheaper overall.

pipeFlushing.title: Pipe Flushing & Descaling – prevent blockages and water damage

hero.h1: Pipe Flushing & Descaling – prevent blockages and water damage
hero.intro: Regular cleaning of pipe systems prevents blockages, improves water quality, and extends pipe life. We use modern methods for efficient cleaning.
features: Camera inspection before and after work

faq.question: How often do pipes need flushing?
faq.answer: It depends on usage and water quality. We recommend annual pipe flushing for most properties, but some need more frequently.

faq.question: Can pipe flushing solve all pipe problems?
faq.answer: Pipe flushing solves most problems with deposits and blockages, but serious damage or incorrect installation may require repair or replacement.

faq.question: Is it safe for residents during pipe flushing?
faq.answer: Yes, we use environmentally friendly agents and coordinate the work so that disruption is minimized. Residents can usually stay.

pipeCoating.title: Pipe Coating with Camera – get full control of pipes

hero.h1: Pipe Coating with Camera – get full control of pipes
hero.intro: With camera technology, we can inspect pipe systems thoroughly and identify problems before they become serious. Perfect for preventive maintenance and troubleshooting.
features: High-resolution camera inspection of pipe systems

process.title: How pipe coating works
steps: Camera inspection of entire pipe system
Report with photos and action proposals

faq.question: What can camera inspection detect?
faq.answer: We can see blockages, leaks, corrosion, incorrect installation, root damage, and other problems that aren't visible from the outside.

faq.question: How long does a camera inspection take?
faq.answer: The time depends on the pipe system's size, but a typical apartment takes 1-2 hours. We give a time estimate before work begins.

faq.question: Do I get photos and video from the inspection?
faq.answer: Yes, you get a detailed report with photos and video showing the pipes' condition and any problems that need to be addressed.

whatAre.title: What are cookies?
whatAre.body: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help the website remember information about your visit, such as your language preferences and other settings.

essential.title: Essential cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They cannot be disabled in our systems.

Security cookies: Protect against security threats
